title: Flight Simulator 2020  - How to  - Things to backup  prior to updating your NVidia video card driver
description:
As most of you know a clean install of the driver is recommended however this will result in all settings being lost. In this video we will look at which settings you need to backup prior to updating your NVidia video card driver.

Settings lost after installing a Nvidia driver update
Backup your graphic settings for MSFS 2020 prior to installing an Nvidia update
